Package transport

Interface IDelivery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IExporter
    public interface IDelivery
extends IExporter

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)
    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
    2019 / 2020

    Represents the Delivery behaviour

    Authors:

    • @author Ricardo Santos
    • @author Bruno Oliveira

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Getter for delivery id that acts as unique identifier for the delivery
        Returns:
        delivery id

      • setVehicle

        void setVehicle​(IVehicle vehicle,
                IDriver driver)
         throws DeliveryException
        Assigns the vehicle and the driver to the delivery. The vehicle must have the free status and after assignment the status must be changed to in preparation. The driver must have the free status and after assignment must be changed to assigned.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle assigned to the delivery
        driver - driver assigned to the delivery
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if:
        1. any parameter is null
        2. any item was already assigned to the delivery
        3. the vehicle status is different from free
        4. the (@link DriverStatus status} is different from free
        5. the driver do not have a license type that matches the allowed vehicle license types

      • getVehicle

        IVehicle getVehicle()
        Getter for the vehicle assigned to the delivery
        Returns:
        vehicle assigned to the delivery, null if none.

      • load

        boolean load​(IItem item,
             IPosition position)
      throws DeliveryException
        Load/add a new item to the delivery in a given position considering transportation restrictions. When the item is loaded/added/inserted, the delivery weight is updated to control the weight. If there isn't enough space in the collection, the collection should be adjusted to store more packed items. Item status must be set to ASSIGNED
        Parameters:
        item - item to be added
        position - position in which the item will be placed
        Returns:
        1. true if inserted
        2. false if the item already exists in the delivery
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if:
        1. any parameter is null
        2. item status is not NON_DELIVERED
        3. if no vehicle and/or driver are assigned
        4. the vehicle status is different from in preparation
        5. if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the delivery or if some item is overlapping with other item
        6. if weight is exceeded
        7. if transportation restrictions of the current are not valid for the item

      • unload

        boolean unload​(IItem item,
               ItemStatus itemStatus)
        throws DeliveryException
        Unloads/Removes an item from the delivery. When the item is removed, the weight should be managed to validate delivery weight.
        Parameters:
        item - item to be removed
        itemStatus - status to be set for the items
        Returns:
        true if removed, false if the item doesn't exists in the delivery
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if:
        1. the parameter is null
        2. if no vehicle and/or driver are assigned
        3. parameter itemStatus is not ItemStatus.DELIVERED or ItemStatus.NON_DELIVERED
        4. the vehicle status is different from in preparation or in transit

      • unload

        boolean unload​(IDestination destination,
               ItemStatus itemStatus)
        throws DeliveryException
        Unloads/Removes all items considering a destination. When the items are removed, the weight should be managed to validate delivery weight.
        Parameters:
        destination - destination used to identify the items to be removed
        itemStatus - status to be set for the items
        Returns:
        true if items are removed, false if the destination doesn't exist in the delivery
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if:
        1. the parameter is null
        2. if no vehicle and/or driver are assigned
        3. parameter itemStatus is not ItemStatus.DELIVERED or ItemStatus.NON_DELIVERED
        4. the vehicle status is different from in preparation or in transit

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns if delivery is empty
        Returns:
        trueif delivery is empty, false otherwise

      • getRemainingItems

        IItem[] getRemainingItems()
        Return the items that are not delivered
        Returns:
        items that are not delivered, null if none exist

      • getRemainingDestinations

        IDestination[] getRemainingDestinations()
        Return the destinations of the items to be delivered
        Returns:
        the destinations of the items to be delivered, null if none exist

      • start

        void start()
    throws DeliveryException
        Starts the transportation process. The vehicle status must be defined as in transit
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if
        1. if no vehicle and/or driver are assigned
        2. if the status is not in preparation
        3. if delivery is empty

      • end

        void end()
  throws DeliveryException
        Ends the transportation process. The status must be defined as free, driver status must be set to free. The items should be unloaded with ItemStatus.NON_DELIVERED status.
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if vehicle status is different than in_transit

      • getCurrentWeight

        double getCurrentWeight()
        Getter for the delivery weight based on the items weight
        Returns:
        the sum of items weights
